metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1730 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in libssh versions before 0.8.9 and before 0.9.4 in theway it handled AES-CTR (or DES ciphers if enabled) ciphers. The server orclient could crash when the connection hasn't been fully initialized andthe system tries to cleanup the ciphers when closing the connection. Thebiggest threat from this vulnerability is system availability.

criterions.comment: libssh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
